description: Try our easy to follow Moreton Bay Bugs With Vietnamese Dill Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lobster dishes,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,Christmas,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Dairy free,Stone fruit
name: Moreton Bay Bugs With Vietnamese Dill Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small red chillies, finely chopped (see tip)
1 fennel, cut into thin wedges lengthwise
100g snow peas, cut into thirds on the diagonal
2 gem lettuce, leaves separated and washed

recipeInstructions.text: Chop half the peanuts. Use a folded tea towel to cover the back of a large sharp knife and cut the Moreton bay bugs in half from head to tail.
Combine eschalot, lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, dill, chilli, half the peanuts, 2 tbs peanut oil, sesame oil and 2 tbs water in a small bowl and mix well to combine.

Heat a chargrill or barbecue over medium-high heat. Toss nectarine wedges in 1 tbs peanut oil and grill for 1-2 minutes each side, or until golden. Toss fennel in the same bowl and season with salt and pepper, chargrill for 2-3 minutes each side, or until charred and tender.
Arrange lettuce, chargrilled nectarine, fennel, snowpeas and radishes on a platter, drizzle 2 tbs of dressing over salad. Season to taste. Scatter with remaining peanuts.
Dress the bugs with half the dressing and scatter with peanuts. Serve with remaining dressing.
